cause.description:
At the ACW, they help pople living with HIV/AIDS. They do outreach programs to youth for prevention, seminars to local groups for awareness. They also teach people how to cope with their everyday difficulties.
The ACW also has a group for Lesbian, Gay, Bi-sexual, Transgendered and questioning Youth. They have a place to go and make friends talk, about their problem and feel safe all with others around their age. (no other place in windsor-essex county like it)
1. Being Cared for is a universal need.
2. Taking care of the lgbtq communitee youth is top priority
3. Life should not be taken for granted
4. HIV/AIDS MUST BE FOUGHT! through education and prevention!
cause.mission: Help People with HIV/Aids and Lgbtq youth.
cause.name: Aids Committee of Windsor
